Package test_single_channel_advection
[test_transport]

Test advection in a single channel for a flow regime that goes back and forth and ends up in the same spot periodically. More...


Functions/Subroutines

subroutine test_advection_convergence (label, hydro, domain_length, total_time, fine_initial_conc, fine_solution, nstep_base, nx_base, nconc, verbose)
 Subroutine that tests advection convergence A fine grid initial condition and solution at time total_time must be provided.

Detailed Description

Test advection in a single channel for a flow regime that goes back and forth and ends up in the same spot periodically.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine test_single_channel_advection.test_advection_convergence ( character(LEN=*),intent(in)  label,
hydro  ,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  domain_length,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  total_time,
real(stm_real),dimension(nx_base,nconc),intent(in)  fine_initial_conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(nx_base,nconc),intent(in)  fine_solution,
integer,intent(in)  nstep_base,
integer,intent(in)  nx_base,
integer,intent(in)  nconc,
logical,intent(in)  verbose 
)

Subroutine that tests advection convergence A fine grid initial condition and solution at time total_time must be provided.

Parameters:
label unique label for test
domain_length length of domain
total_time total time of simulation
fine_initial_conc initial condition at finest resolution
fine_solution reference solution at finest resolution
nstep_base number of steps at finest resolution
nx_base number of cells at finest resolution
nconc number of constituents
verbose whether to output convergence results
